name: nativescript-ngx-slides
description: NativeScript + Angular version of the slides

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-ngx-slides && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm install && cd demo && npm install && cd .. &&  cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
scripts.ios: xcproj --project platforms/ios/YourApp.xcodeproj touch; xcproj --project platforms/ios/Pods/Pods.xcodeproj touch; tns livesync ios --emulator --watch
